doc-page/pathToChapterFiles.description: A path to a folder that will hold the files for this DocPage. It must be relative to the "src" folder.

doc-page/chapterOrder.description:
The file names (with extension) inside the "pathToChapterFiles". These files will become your rendered doc page.

The files array can be a combination of .vue and .md files. Whenever it's a .vue file, it's rendered with <ExampleSection />. Whenever it's an .md file, it's rendered with <MarkdownSection />.

doc-page/pathToApiCardSourceFile.description: (optional) A path to a vue file to generate an API Card at the bottom of the doc page.
